title: Service disruption on North East Line

title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Laut

updates.text: 29/07, 9.03am: NEL service has resumed since 8:11am. Free bus rides & bridging bus services have ceased. Once again, we are sorry.
29/07, 8:31am: NEL svc has resumed. However stations are crowded. Pls expect delays. Free bus rides & bridging bus svcs are still available.
29/07, 8:18am: NEL service has resumed. Free bus rides & bridging bus services are still available.
29/07, 8:08am: NEL delay - Free bus rides & bridging bus services are available btwn Potong Pasir NE10 & Punggol NE17
29/07, 7.38am: NEL delay - Assist with your journey, free bus rides available at designated bus stops btwn Potong Pasir NE10 & Punggol NE17.
29/07, 7.31am: NEL svc is delayed due to a train fault at Buangkok NE15. Additional travel time of abt 15 mins may be expected. We are sorry
